name: Koibito - A Pitch Accent Practice Game
name_original: Koibito - A Pitch Accent Practice Game
description:
Play as Yu Miyazaki, an American exchange student in Japan who speaks virtually zero Japanese. Survive your dates with linguistic back-channeling, bluff your way into the hearts of others, and maybe even learn some Japanese in this educational visual novel.

Credits:
